EmailTemplate.name: ATS ECCN
EmailTemplate.subject: ATS ECCN Lookup
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your email requesting Export Control Compliance information. This information is available to you directly on the Honeywell Portal (www.aerospace.honeywell.com) Once you login go to Purchase>Orders>PN Search For ECCN (PN Search). Once there you will need to enter the part number and the system will provide the ECCN for the part number you are needing information on. If you need additional assistance for this information please send an email to Quotes@honeywell.com and they will be able to provide any additional information that you might need.
